text: geumjidoen dal-i jinamyeon neohuiga balgyeonhaneun bulsinjadeulmada salhaehago geudeul-eul pololo jabgeona geudeul-eul po wihal geos-imyeo geudeul-e daebihayeo bog byeonghala geuleona geudeul-i hoegaehago yebaeleul deulimyeo iseullamseleul tteol ttae neun geudeul-eul wihae gil-eul yeol-eojulini sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chung manhasim-ila
